author: zhaobenny
description: Utilize OpenAI to reply randomly to messages (or images) in a cynical tone.
install_msg: See README.md. Set OpenAI key using [p]set api openai api_key,INSERT_API_KEY and [p]ai_user add CHANNEL_ID to whitelist channels for the bot to start replying
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users but messages will be sent to OpenAI to generate responses.
